Steps.Message: Update at 01:33 - Our team of specialist engineers  have arrived on site to locate and fix the underground cable fault. To allow them time to safely complete the repairs, we've changed the estimated time to between 05:30 and 06:30. With the cold weather, we understand that it can be very concerning to have a power cut as this may have affected your heating. If you have someone in the property who may be more vulnerable to the cold please do not hesitate to call us free on 105. We will do our best to provide additional care and support whilst work continues to get your power back on asap.

We became aware of a power cut at 22:33. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 01:33 - Our team of specialist engineers  have arrived on site to locate and fix the underground cable fault. To allow them time to safely complete the repairs, we've changed the estimated time to between 05:30 and 06:30. With the cold weather, we understand that it can be very concerning to have a power cut as this may have affected your heating. If you have someone in the property who may be more vulnerable to the cold please do not hesitate to call us free on 105. We will do our best to provide additional care and support whilst work continues to get your power back on asap.

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
